concept.title: Custom Tuning
concept.shortdesc: Custom guitar tuning involves tuning of one or more guitar stings lower than their standard tuning between one half tone and two whole tones lower than standard tuning.

conbody.p: If the low E is tuned lower, the high E is also tuned lower by the same amount. Other custom tuning options including tuning all of the stings a half tone, whole tone, one and a half tones, or two tones lower. This is essential relative tuning the guitar a certain nunber of tones lower.
conbody.note: Custom tuning is never higher than the original string's intended tones because the stings could break.
